showScoreExcerpt:
"This third Broadway edition, staged by Lear deBessonet at the St. James after a limited Encores run at City Center, has the intimacy and the ingenuity of an Off-Broadway production, the razzle-dazzle of an all-star cast, and a brilliant staging equally hilarious and moving."

Read more
